title: Valkyrie Rising
description: I am a Valkyrie, sent by my sisters to Midgard after one tiny mistake. The worst part is that I absolutely hate this planet, the one the humans call "Earth."I'm ready to return to Asgard, where I may grow victorious and earn my place in Valhalla.My plans are foiled, however, when three Asgardians appear on Earth to warn me against Fenrir, the wolf shifter meant to destroy the world, Freyr, Freyja's brother and God of desire, and Tyr, Fenrir's worst enemy.I will do everything I can to end Ragnarok and return home, but there's something about these men that makes me think Midgard might not be so terrible after all.Valkyrie Rising is an 18+ Paranormal Romance which includes adult themes and MM.
author: Alexis Pierce
